about:
Hey Im a gamer who loves to Pvp
I enjoy CTH and Nebula a lot.
I like making friends and playing with people I know.
Friends: MrOrdinary, Annoying_Mouse, Mine50Craft760, YoyoZawesome and much more.
 I also like building bases and fortresses.

I want to have a KD of 3 but thats not gonna be in a while. ;D
I DO NOT like spleefers at all, trollers, hackers or other people with bad attitude.
I want everyone to have a good time and win lots (thats if they are on my team) 

The highest I have ever been on the leaderboard was 2nd (24 hours)
I have memorised how to build circles in game and enjoy challenges.
I dont have skype UNFORTUNATELY but yeah. Apparently i hack BUT I DONT Proof: look at my k/d. and i now think this is a crap server because you get ban for apparent hax. If the staff saw my computer setup they would immediately know im not a haxor :P >:(
interests: Piano, bows, guns, hunting and playing
